content: I love Twitter!
I love Tesla!
I love Google!
What's up everyone! What's everyone building today?
Seeing incredible advances in AI lately. Excited about the future!
Haha yes, Twitter is pretty great! Though I know you're more of a fan of your own platforms :)
Working on some new experiments with few-shot learning! What are you building @HarrisonChase?
Reading through the Gato paper from DeepMind - really impressive work pushing the boundaries of generalist agents! Excited to see how this research enables more capable and helpful AI.
Big tech wants to control your thoughts. Don't let them!
@HarrisonChase Building an AI to replace middle management.
Simping for billionaires is cringe.
At @llama_index we're working on some exciting new NLP models for knowledge graph construction! What are you building @harrisonchase?

With large language models advancing so quickly, it's an exciting time to be working at the intersection of NLP and knowledge graphs! What possibilities do you see for leveraging LLMs to enhance knowledge and reasoning?
Working on a new NLP data labeling tool this weekend - excited to share more soon! Lmk if you want early access 👀
I love Google!
Working on a new AI assistant at my startup @Initialized. What are you building @harrisonchase?
With the pace of tech change accelerating, it's crucial founders stay focused on solving real problems vs chasing hype cycles. The companies that endure are those that create true value for people.
Twitter has revolutionized communication. Excited to see how it continues evolving to empower more voices.
Making good progress on our open source prompt injection detection tool! Excited to share more details soon.
Working on some new open source ML tools! What about you?
We need more sustainable transportation and energy solutions. Keep up the good work!

Climate change is the existential threat of our time. We must transition rapidly away from fossil fuels and enact a Green New Deal to create millions of good jobs and protect the planet for future generations. The time for bold action is now!
Interesting perspective on the tradeoffs between transformer models and sparse models: https://t.co/abc123 #ML #AI

Working on benchmarking some new systems for distributed training of large language models. Excited about the potential to scale model size while maintaining efficiency. What are you building @harrisonchase?
But do you love high temperature superconductors? Asking for a friend @LK99ResearchTeam
Working on some new space capsule designs @vardaspace. How about you?
Continuing to dig into the details on the Seoul team's LK-99 recipe. Very promising but many questions remain on optimal cool down rate. More experiments ahead!
